items.content_html: Astral.js is a lightweight UI toolkit designed to empower JavaScript developers with powerful tools for building modern user interfaces. With Astral.js, you gain access to a comprehensive set of features including context and state management, event-driven architecture, and sophisticated JavaScript-powered media queries.
items.title: rabisnaqvi/Astral.js: Astral.js is a lightweight UI toolkit designed to empower JavaScript developers with powerful tools for building modern user interfaces. With Astral.js, you gain access to a comprehensive set of features including context and state management, event-driven architecture, and sophisticated JavaScript-powered media queries.

items.content_html: Worker-webserver is a lightweight NPM package that allows you to implement a web server in your service worker using the fetch event. It allows you to intercept incoming requests, match them with a user-defined router, and execute a series of middleware functions to handle them.
items.title: lulusir/worker-webserver: Worker-webserver is a lightweight NPM package that allows you to implement a web server in your service worker using the fetch event. It allows you to intercept incoming requests, match them with a user-defined router, and execute a series of middleware functions to handle them.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
